title: Certik Study: $332 Million Lost to Exploits, Hacks and Scams in September, More Than $1.3 Billion Lost in 2023
description: In the month of September, digital assets worth approximately $332 million were siphoned from trading platforms via methods that include flash loan attacks, exit scams, and exploits. The value of digital assets stolen through exploits rose from $13.5 million in August to nearly $330 million in September. Mixin Kernel Incident Most Significant Exploit in September […]

title: HTX Global hacker restores faith by returning stolen funds
description: In an unexpected twist, the hacker who breached HTX Global, formerly known as Huobi, has chosen to make amends by returning all the stolen assets. This surprising turn of events has had a significant impact on the cryptocurrency community, as it sheds light on the evolving landscape of cybersecurity in the digital asset space and ... Read more

title: Renowned Investor Charlie Munger Shares Views on AI and Bitcoin
description: Charlie Munger, Vice President of Berkshire Hathaway and a well-respected figure in the financial world, recently spoke at the Zoomtopia Conference. During his address, he discussed the current state of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and expressed some reservations about its growing prominence. In today’s tech-centric landscape, AI has gained significant traction. OpenAI’s ChatGPT, a chatbot renowned ... Read more
